name: Lua Script - e5f875c2
config:
{"conditions": [], "script": "local input = GetVar(ctx, "fec_card_block_syntax")
syntax_input = string.match(input, "KT%s%d+")
local isValidKTSyntax = 0
if syntax_input ~= nil
  then
    if ((string.len(syntax_input) == 7) and (string.len(input)==7))
      then
    	  isValidKTSyntax = 1
          syntax_input = string.match(syntax_input, "%d+")
          SetVar(ctx, "fec_card_block_card_no", syntax_input)
          
      else
    	  syntax_input = ""
    end
  end
SetVar(ctx, "isValidKTSyntax", isValidKTSyntax)
", "buttons": [], "show_error_messages": false}
